name: Forsaken: My Love and Hate For You
name_original: Forsaken: My Love and Hate For You
description:
Forsaken: My Love and Hate for You is an 18+ linear visual novel that takes place before the events of the comic, Forsaken (Prologue of Forsaken available only on Patreon for now). Following Faust and Amon, you play through the hardships in they face in their early lives and come to learn how the relationship between the two unravels.

Forsaken: My Love and Hate for You originally was supposed to be a short side mini-comic series to the main comic, Forsaken. But it was made into a visual novel to help me decide whether I should keep its comic counterpart, Forsaken,  as a comic or turn it into a visual novel as well.

The visual novel is a linear visual novel, meaning that though there are different choice in the game, none of them will affect the outcome of events nor the ending within the game.

Updates will come around 1-3 months, depending on how my other comics and Patreon build of the game is currently progressing. I am working on this all by myself amongst my other comics, personal works, and commissions all at once, so please be patient when it comes to updates~

The first full update is now on Patreon and the next update is currently being worked on. The first public build will be released at the same time the next Patreon build is released. If you'd like updates or to check out my other comics and works, check out my Twitter here for more!
